title: Great one bedroom available! Pre-war vintage charm
map_address: 2524 N Kedzie Blvd #3E near Kedzie & Wrightwood
posting_body: Wonderful Logan Square 1 bed, 1 bath available.
Amazing location—5 min walk to blue line train and all that Logan Square has to offer (across from Lula Cafe).
We lived here for 5 years and loved it.
• Ample closet space and additional basement storage unit
• South-facing windows with lots of natural light
• 3rd Floor (top floor, no noise above you)
We bought a house and are helping our landlord rent the unit.
Please call the leasing department at 773-661-0111 to set an appointment.
We are also selling our window a/c units.
They're nearly new (used for 4 months since purchase at the end of Aug 2021).
Willing to strike a deal for these.
Reach out to us directly for purchase.
• Selling 3 units, individually or as a set
• Smart with Wi-Fi and App to control
We moved to a place with central AC and no longer need but after spending 4 summers using hand-me-down window AC units this upgrade was an absolute DELIGHT.
But most importantly: kept us cool!
• Ultra quiet operation at 43 dB, maximum comfort and minimum noise
• Wirelessly monitor, schedule and control smart AC from anywhere
• Energy efficient and quick cooling with 3 cooling and fan speeds
